#summary Check list for releasing a new version on CTAN
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation


== Check list for CTAN releases ==

Changes in the file *`xcookybooky.dtx`*
  * Update the copyright year (line 3)
  * Update the version number and date at `<package>` (line 21)
  * Add a change block with the new version number and a corresponding explanation (approx. line 78)
  * Update the checksum (if necessary) (line 56)

Changes in the file *`xcookybooky.ins`*
  * Update the file date (line 4)
  * Update the copyright year (line 30)
